title: Jacket
description: coarse blue fabric; solidly embroidered on shoulders, arms and lower back in dark gold--solid running stitch; deep side vents; sleeve edges and back bottom bound in cording; neck edge has applied pattern embroidery; geometric pattern embroidery on center back yoke and top of back
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
